places_with_reviews.name: Hanuman Temple
places_with_reviews.address: 6FMV+4J3, Panchvati Area., NR Jayvir Society, Ambika Nagar, Kalol, Gujarat 382721, India

reviews.text: Hanuman Temple is famous place for Panchvati area. It is located in heart of PANCHVATI AREA. Centre location in the area. Its famous as PANCHVATI circle. Every event, market set here.

This is "Ram Doot Hanumanji Temple" and called Hanumanji Mandir.
It's located in Panchavati area of Kalol.
Very good religious place.
Satsang and other religious activities going on here.
Nice place for mental peace. Small garden also here.
Place is very neat & Clean.
Our daily rutine for pray to Hanuman Dada in this temple
Very peaceful place

Peaceful just like all other temples and religious place... Has a little private garden in front of it where the owner doesn't mind if you sit for a bit... Temple is covered by roads on both sides so take care when crossing...

places_with_reviews.name: Swaminarayan Mandir Kalol(Narnarayan Dev Gadi)
places_with_reviews.address: Near Shayog Society, Hanuman Temple, Sahyog Society, Panchavati, Ambika Nagar, Kalol, Gujarat 382721, India

reviews.text:
Very beautiful temple of lord Shree Swaminarayan under kalupur gadi.
Very nice murti darshan of Gopinathji and Nar-Narayan dev.
You will feel clam and peaceful on entering the temple.
A must visit place for Swaminarayan devotees.
Jay Shree Swaminarayan.
Beautiful Temple of Lord Swaminarayan

This temple is very beutiful. Everytime we go there we feel Bhagwan Swaminarayan is there. This temple has the original gyry parampara Bhagwan Swaminarayan has given us. It is under Shree Narnarayandev Gadi. It is built new recently with nice shikarbandh Mandir.
Peaceful place. You feel to touch god
Good spiritual place located in centre of PANCHVATI area. KALOL. so I like this temple and I often visit here. But one problem is parking.
